body.p: In August 2014 the Board published an Exposure Draft of proposed amendments to IAS 12 to clarify the requirements on recognition of deferred tax assets for unrealised losses on debt instruments measured at fair value. The Board subsequently modified and confirmed the proposals and in January 2016 issued Recognition of Deferred Tax Assets for Unrealised Losses (Amendments to IAS 12). The Board’s considerations and reasons for its conclusions are discussed in paragraphs BC37–BC62.
